sections.Prominent merchants:
* [[Illyrio Mopatis]], also a [[Magister]] of the [[Free City]] of Pentos.
* {[[Xaro Xhoan Daxos]]}, a native of the Summer Isles, member of [[the Thirteen]] of Qarth and would-be [[King of Qarth]]. Locked inside his own empty vault by [[Daenerys Targaryen]] for plotting against her.
* {[[Kraznys mo Nakloz]]}, a slaver and one of the [[Good Masters]] of Astapor. Burned alive by [[Drogon]] during the [[Sack of Astapor]].
* [[Razdal mo Eraz]], one of the [[Wise Masters]] of [[Yunkai]].
